i a haven't played in a few year but from what i remember about he game is that it used to be balanced. What i mean is that i am able to get a kill in a casual game but in comp its like something changes. either everything is different in casual than it is in comp, or the game itself is broken. now i will admit that its probably just me being a bad player but even so, a game shouldn't work one way in one game mode then it does in a another.
